author: acolytec3
content: I found some in the PR under this branch in the `execution-spec-tests` https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/530 but I can't seem to get them to fill.  Pytest just skips all of them.  <@892053833121923094> are any of these 7685/7002/6110 tests ready to start running our clients against?

author: marioevz
content:
Hey yes! You need a special geth branch to fill these:
https://github.com/marioevz/go-ethereum/tree/prague-devnet-0

After that, you should be able to fill with `fill --fork=Prague ./tests/prague/`

content: ah, thanks!  Was wondering what i was doing wrong

It contains all devnet-0 EIPs minus 3074
